nodes.text: Yeama was a male Twi'lek slave of Hutt crime lord Tassaa Bareesh in 3643 BBY. That year, he served as a guide to two visitors to Bareesh's palace; Sith apprentice Eldon Ax and Sith envoy Ia Nirvin. He was killed during the Skirmish in Tassaa Bareesh's palace by Dao Stryver's concussion missile while manning a laser cannon firing into hex droids while they purposefully deflected his fire to the same place using electromirror shield. That way Yeama accidentally assisted them creating an escape route.
